X.v.1.B.1.d
.
Who May Request Equitable Relief
Requests to the Executive Director of Compensation Service or P&F Service for equitable relief may be made by
a claimant or someone acting on behalf of a claimant, or
a regional office (RO).
Note
:  When a claimant or someone acting on behalf of a claimant specifically requests equitable relief, submit the request to the Executive Director of Compensation Service (21C) or P&F Service (21PF).
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 1, Section B  - Equitable Relief
citation: Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 1, Section B
